A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hey Poe\, show some f'n respect to 3PO you douchebag nobody! Oh\, and hoorraaayyyyy for the forced down our throats social justice girl power bullshit! It's about as realistic as me asking Luke Skywalker to pick up a gallon of milk on his way home from his \"laser sword\" battle with Kylo Renny-Poo. Here's a spinoff movie idea ...
